vectors
Class Point3D

java.lang.Object
  vectors.Point3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPoint3D
public class Point3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPoint3D

This class represents a point in 3D.

Field Summary
private  double x
           
private  double y
           
private  double z
           
 
Constructor Summary
Point3D(double x, double y, double z)
          Constructs a point in 3D.
 
Method Summary
 IPoint3D add(IPoint3D otherPoint)
          Returns a point which adds the coordinate values of this point to the coordinate values of the given point (not changing the coordinate values of this point).
 boolean equals(IPoint3D otherPoint)
          Returns 'true' if the coordinate values of this point are equal to the given point values, otherwise returns 'false'.
 double getDistanceBetweenPoints(IPoint3D otherPoint)
          Returns the distance between this point and the given point.
 double getX()
          Returns the X coordinate of the point.
 double getY()
          Returns the Y coordinate of the point.
 double getZ()
          Returns the Z coordinate of the point.
 boolean isCoLinear(IPoint3D otherPoint1, IPoint3D otherPoint2)
          Returns 'true' if this point is co-linear to the given points, otherwise returns 'false'.
 IPoint3D movePointByVector(IVector3D v)
          Returns the point which we get after moving from this point at the direction of the given vector.
 IPoint3D multiplyByScalar(double scalar)
          Returns a point which multiplies the coordinate values of this point by the given scalar (not changing the coordinate values of this point).
 void setX(double x)
          Sets the X coordinate of the point.
 void setY(double y)
          Sets the Y coordinate of the point.
 void setZ(double z)
          Sets the Z coordinate of the point.
 java.lang.String toString()
          Returns the string representation of the point.
 IVector3D toVector()
          Returns a vector which starts at the origin and ends at this point.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
